name: Emergency Monster Team
description:
This is the first Beta of EMERGENCY MONSTER TEAM.

This story takes place after the events of the visual novel.

You play as Nadel, a Berserker Paramedic who is headed back to work after the events of the "Pipe Man" took place in the monster town of Dendsville. It's up to her to help out various patients and tend to the victims of the attacks on monster kind that have taken place over the last nine days.

++ Included in the game so far ++
- Explore Nadel's apartment building, hospital streets and the Emergency area of the monster hospital.
- Meet some of the monster staff in different locations and preview the cast of characters in the special rooms on the 3rd and 4th floor of the apartment.
- Test battle a few monsters from the comfort of Nadel's living room.
- First Person RPG style combat
- Original hand drawn art by Victor James Toro
- Please Enjoy this Beta.
